about_the_game:
The brave hero has won the heart of the beautiful princess and is about to marry her!

Unfortunately, the evil Demon Queen crashes the wedding and kidnaps the princess, forcing the hero to embark on an epic journey to become stronger and defeat the Demon Queen!

However, in this story, you are not that hero. You are the Demon Queen!

Now that the princess is in your power, your goal is to win her heart. Or is it?

This game lasts for 10 weeks of in-game time. The objective is to enjoy your daily life in various ways until Sunday, when the hero will appear to challenge you. The first time you fight him, he’ll be level 1. However, each time you defeat him, he will level up. Every 10 levels, he will retreat, and the game will progress to the next week. Do you think you can defeat him when he’s level 100?

What can you do in your castle during the week?

Interact with your prisoner. Talk to the princess every day and give her gifts to win her affection through a point system that increases. Complete her story and conquer her, or break her mind with thrilling BDSM sessions to corrupt her until she becomes yours. The choice is yours!

Interact with your wives. You have three wives, each with their own personality and preferences. You can talk to them daily, give them gifts, and engage in intimate activities.

Move around your castle. Explore the sinister castle of the Demon Queen and buy keys in the shop to unlock more rooms, which will grant you additional benefits.

Upgrade your character. The hero may seem laughable at first, daring to face you at level 1. But if he keeps getting stronger while you don't, there will come a time when he might defeat you. To prevent that, you must grow stronger too! Obtain souls, the game’s currency, by being intimate with your wives or defeating the hero. With souls, you can buy gifts for your wives and prisoner, new skills for your queen, phases (you know, when a boss starts using more attacks after losing a certain amount of health), and many other things.

Devour your servants. As the evil queen you are, you might need to devour your beloved servants to grow stronger. Doing so will make them disappear, but you’ll gain essences that increase your maximum stats, allowing you to crush the pitiful hero like a bug. Be careful, though! If you consume too many servants too soon, the others might flee. By the way, you can also devour your wives and prisoner, but you’d never do something like that, right? Right...?

Where’s the sexual content?

Souls also allow you to purchase sexual positions. Once you buy one, talk to your wives or prisoner to enjoy a detailed sexual scene from start to finish. When the scene ends, you’ll receive a lust essence, whose size depends on various factors, which you can sell for more souls. Fun and practical, right?

While your wives will be eager to be intimate with their beloved Demon Queen from day one, your prisoner will be more challenging. First, you’ll need to seduce or conquer her. If you choose to seduce her, as you progress through her story, you’ll witness events that gradually turn up the heat.

What about the hero?

During each of the game’s ten weeks, the hero will appear every Sunday, and you’ll have to defeat him in 1 vs. 1 battles where you are the final boss.

As a boss, you’ll have a massive amount of health and can attack as many times as you want without worrying about MP or cooldowns. After all, you’re the Demon Queen! Your power is infinite! Additionally, as you take damage, you’ll shift phases, unlocking the ability to use more powerful skills—provided you’ve purchased them—and revel in watching the naive hero lose to you over and over again.

But be careful. Every time the hero loses, he’ll return to challenge you at a higher level. And if he defeats you, the game is over. Strengthen yourself to ensure that doesn’t happen!

This game spans 10 weeks of in-game time. Each day, your mission is to gradually win the princess’s heart by talking to her every day, giving her gifts, and completing events as they’re unlocked. Or, if you prefer, corrupt her with thrilling BDSM tortures until her mind breaks and she becomes yours. The choice is yours!

Aside from that, you have three wives under your command, with whom you can chat daily and engage in intimate activities. There are plenty of different sexual positions!

Unfortunately, things won’t be so peaceful. A pitiful boy who fancies himself a hero believes he can defeat you and rescue his beloved. Prove him wrong!

At the end of each week, experience what it’s like to be a final boss, crushing the hero repeatedly with your overwhelming power in turn-based battles where you can use any skill as often as you like. No MP or cooldown limits. You’re the Demon Queen—your power is infinite!

Possible endings.

This game features a total of 8 different endings, depending on your success or failure against the hero and the decisions you make regarding your prisoner throughout the game. It also includes a New Game+. Once you complete it, you can replay with your current stats, shortcuts to make the game easier to finish, hints to unlock other endings, and the ability to strengthen the hero for a true challenge.

If you unlock all the endings, a grand surprise awaits you!

content_descriptors.notes:
In the game, the player can have sex with her three wives and the princess. To have sex, you have to buy sex positions from one of the in-game shops (with in-game money, of course). Once you've bought a sex position, you can talk to any of your wives or the princess and select that sex position.
Also, once you've earned 100 love points with the princess, you'll be able to play her fifth event, and after finishing this event, you'll automatically see a sex scene with her. From that point on, the princess will be available to have sex with freely.
All of these sex scenes are between characters of legal age and are consensual. Even with the princess, they are consensual, as you only unlock them when she develops feelings for the player and agrees to have sex with him.
